page.title: 18The Future
page.content: Our group's topic was the future of Seaton Delaval. First we prepared some questions which we used in{interviews} with passers-by at the Avenue Head. Two of our parents took us up and we asked our questions and recorded the answers on two tape recorders. We asked about energy of the future, houses, facilities and so on. The most popular hope was for the extension of the{Tyneside Metro}to Seaton Delaval. The Metro is a system using electric trams and part of it goes under the city of Newcastle. Some people hoped for a large shopping area such as Eldon Square in Newcastle, but we thought if the Metro was extended here we wouldn't need a large shopping area with its traffic jams etc. We hope Seaton Delaval will stay a{friendly} place to live in as it is now!
